title: Stocks surge following positive vaccine news
description: Stocks are surging to record highs following reports that Pfizer’s coronavirus vaccine is 90 percent effective. NBC News’ Stephanie Ruhle explains what this means for an economy facing a presidential transition.

title: Rockefeller Center Christmas tree allegedly selected as Covid-19 cases surge

title: Covid-19 patients in Italy receive oxygen in their cars as hospitals run out of room
